resources.string: Use the side menu to explore the behaviour and customization of HorizontalStepView and VerticalStepView
To display steps in order, call setReverse(false) on the VerticalStepView. Refer BasicVerticalForwardFragment
By default, the VerticalStepView shows steps in reverse order
The dimensions and styles of the StepView drawables, lines and text can be customized programmatically. Refer to CustomFragment for more.
Use the buttons below to \'navigate\' between steps and toggle their state
